      • checkIfFlightIsBookable

        public static Flight checkIfFlightIsBookable(java.lang.String from,
                                             java.lang.String to,
                                             java.util.Date arrivalDate,
                                             java.util.Date departureDate)
        This function checks if the flight exist in order to book it.
        Parameters:
        from - the airport name where the plane will departure
        to - the airport name where the plane will arrive
        arrivalDate - the date when the plane will arrive
        departureDate - the date when the plane will departure
        Returns:
        f the flight if exist one null if no flight exist
